subtitles.text: Thank you for watching!
Here we go again, it's starting.
It's time for another episode of "Halo! Stay, this time with Rei Inoue from JuiceJuice and Akari Endo from JuiceJuice!
This time, we will be presenting with these two, so please bear with us until the end. Please bear with me until the end.
Today, JuiceJuice released the best selection album "Juice Story" to commemorate the 10th anniversary of JuiceJuice. Yay! Thank you very much.
It's a best selection album, so it's a collection of 13 songs from Elisuguri.
All of the songs were self-remade and recorded on sileck, and the orchestrations were also changed a bit.
And there is one new song in the album, BON VOYAGE.
There is a song called "BON VOYAGE" (Trail of Thoughts).
Yes, this song has very positive lyrics, and I personally think it's very beautiful.
There is a scene where Ms. Kazuha Arisase is playing the violin, and her tone is really beautiful.
I would like you to listen to it with all your ears.
And I heard that she thought up the melody and recorded it herself, so I think it really shows her personality.
I think it will be a very memorable song for Uemura-san as well.
I also tried to think about how I wanted to sing this song during the recording process, so when you listen to it, I hope you will enjoy it as much as I did.
When you listen to the songs, I hope you will find many good things about the members and listen to them.
You have started a tour with the same title as this album.
Juice-Tory
How is it going?
Well, Juice-Tory is meant to show the history of Juice.
The setlist is the same, and the theme of this tour is our explosive power, so we are trying our best to bring our power to you.
We are trying our best to deliver power to you with our explosive power.
And now that Miki Kawashima has joined the group, I have become a senior member.
Miki Kawashima is very cool and has a wonderful singing voice.
I have to do my best not to lose to her.
I will do my best.
Now, please watch this video.
Thank you for watching!

This is Halo with Reine Inoue and Akari Endo of Juice Juice! Stay!
I'm going to ask you a few questions, so don't think too much and answer them quickly.
I'll do my best. Okay, here we go.
So, Shuri, you've recently become interested in arranging hair. What kind of arrangement are you secretly practicing?
Curly hair.
Deren It's been about a year since you joined Juice Juice. What's the biggest change in yourself?
I've become closer to my seniors.
Deren, what kind of work do you want to do now?
I would like to work with Rio Sakurai of Morning Musume。 Rio Sakurai of Morning Musume。ヌ23 and Sakura Ishiyama of Juice Juice, I want to hold an event with them.
Deren, if you were to go out to eat with me, what would you like to eat?
Spaghetti with cod roe.
Oh, that sounds great!
This year is the 25th anniversary of Hello! Project. What song best fits Akari's motto of "work hard"?
Shalala by Kobushi Factory.
Ooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!
Wow, the tempo was really good.
I thought it was a nice touch.
First of all, you've been arranging your hair lately, haven't you?
I'm into curly hair.
Not secretly, but...
I've been curling my hair a little more.
I have a lot of hair.
It's very hard to curl it. It's a little bit hard to wind up.
It takes a lot of time.
I'm going to keep working hard to roll in those parts gradually
I'm going to keep working on it.
I'm looking forward to it.
I want to do something for her.
I can't do hair, but...
I can't do hair, but I can do makeup.
I want you to do it.
I'd like to try it.

I asked her if she'd go out to eat with me.
I've been saying that we should go out for ice cream.
I've been saying it too much and now the ice cream season is ending.
I've been saying it too much and now the ice cream season is over.

I was thinking how great Juice is.
I was able to put a lot of energy into my performance.

I don't have a lot of hair, but it gets damaged easily.
So I have to take really good care of my hair, otherwise I wouldn't be able to do it anymore.

Next up was a presentation of the lyrics that touched my heart. Yay!
Project has many lyrics that touch our hearts, but the other day was a sports day, so I would like to share with you some lyrics and phrases that are perfect for physical exercises.
Okay, Inoue, let's start.
I am ℃-ute-san. I would like to recommend "Iron Heart" by ℃-ute.

The chorus of "Iron Heart" is very similar to the chorus of the song. The chorus of the song says, "Run through, iron heart, burn hot, iron heart," so I hope everyone's bodies and hearts will burn hot as well.

The choreography of the chorus is also about running with your feet like this, so I think it would be good to run, or if you are a hurdle runner, you can jump up and down with a "Hurray! If you are running hurdles, I would like to see you jump up and down with a "Hurray!
If you are doing hurdle running, I would be happy if you could jump with a "Hurray! If you are doing hurdle running, I would like you to run as fast as you can.
You will sweat twice as much as usual.
I think this is a song that will challenge you seriously.
I am cheering for you. We support you.

And we sang this song, and the lyrics really resonated with me.
I was deeply moved by the lyrics as I sang it.
There are other great lyrics, too.
There's another lyric that says, "Let's change 'I'm sorry' to 'thank you.
The lyrics are also really good, and after I heard the lyrics, I often say "excuse me" to store clerks and such.
I stopped saying "I'm sorry" as a reflex and just said "thank you".
It made me feel a little better, so please give it a try!
So, please look forward to the next issue!
This time, Rei Inoue and Akari Endo of Juice-Juice will be presenting "Halo! STE, presented by Reie Inoue and Akari Endo of Juice-Juice.
As I mentioned in the opening, today, October 11, Juice-Juice's 10th anniversary best selection album "Juice-Tory" will be released.
Juice-Juice's 10th anniversary best selection album, Juice-Tory, has been released!
I would like to talk a little about this Juice-Tory, and I would like to share with you some of the points that impressed me personally or that I was particular about.
I'd like to talk a little about Juice-Tory, but I'd like to share with you some of the points that impressed me personally, or that I was particular about.
I had been listening to it thinking it was really cool, but when I listened to another version, I thought it was possible to do it this way, too.

The BPM hasn't changed at all, but the groove of the instruments makes such a difference, and that's why I recorded the song. The BPM did not change at all, but the groove of the instruments made such a difference in the recording.
I sing a cappella at the beginning of Wonderful World.
That was really....
It's hard to believe that there are 11 of us, and we all sound so beautiful together.
I hope you will listen carefully to those parts, and I'm looking forward to hearing each voice.
Wow, you can do that among 11 people? That's right.
Some of them are a little difficult.
I would like to try it myself.
I would like to try it too.
And also, in this album, the older team and the younger team sang one song each,
My older team sings Black Butterfly.
I had been listening to the voices of the original members and learning how they sang like this,
I was learning how to sing like this by listening to the voices of the original members and studying how they sang,
It was difficult for me to sing in my own way on recordings,
But when I heard the cheers, I thought it was really cool,
The younger team sang for the first time in their experience.
The younger team is singing for the first time. They are trying their best in that song, but there is a part where they start to sound like lines during the interlude,
If I'm not careful, I get carried away by the feeling of embarrassment,
But in those moments, I just let go of my emotions and say the lines as boldly as I can, and I hope you enjoy the song.
I hope you will listen to it. It's really cute, so please listen to it.
I hope you will find the goodness in each of the 11 members of the new JuiceJuice, and I hope you will also notice the changes from the past.
You can already hear this song on the tour, so let's enjoy the tour together.
Halo! STE!

Looking back on those two days, was there anything memorable? I guess so.
I have always admired Cute and have been active in the project for a long time,
Kobushi Factory was originally created to carry on the spirit of Berryz KOBO,

That's right.

Juice-Juice's Inomerite Akari Endo presents Halo! Sta!" by Juice-Juice's Inomerite Endo Akari.
It's time for us to say goodbye, so here's an announcement.
As I've told you before, today, October 11th.
Juice-Juice, the best selection album commemorating our 10th anniversary, has been released!
Well, I've already told you a lot about it, so I hope you can understand the appeal of the album.
I'm sure you can understand the appeal of this album, but listening to it with your ears is totally different from listening to it with words, so please get it and listen to it.
I hope you will get it and listen to it a lot!
And Juice-Juice 10th Anniversary Concert Tour

I think we probably feel nostalgic.

I think they look so cute with their makeup.
I'd like to see them too.
